forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 49. South wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle between 7am and 8am. Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the first light of dawn begins to shape a new day in Downtown San Francisco, a delicate veil of cloud covers the sky, hinting at the gentle embrace of the marine layer. This early morning, while temperatures linger around a cool 49 degrees, a soft south wind makes its presence felt, whispering through the streets. While there is a slight chance of drizzle at daybreak, the promise of sunshine beckons, inviting the city to shed its night cloak and reveal the beauty hiding beneath. The afternoon will see the temperature stabilize near 60, only to dip slightly as the day unfolds, kiting gracefully between the subtleties of warmth and coolness provided by the wind.

Today carries a contemplative ambiance, as fog breathes softly along the bay, shrouding the Golden Gate and reflecting an ethereal quality—perfect for quiet strolls along the waterfront or perhaps a leisurely coffee at a local café, where the atmosphere blends easily with the tender shoreline fog. Those venturing out should consider layering, donning a light sweater or jacket that can be removed as the sun makes its ascent, complemented by comfortable footwear suited for meandering through the charming streets. Engaging in a relaxed wander through the Presidio or savoring a moment at one of the city’s serene parks might just be the ideal way to embrace the tranquil yet invigorating spirit of the day.
